content.question: By the late 1960s, critics within the Civil Rights movement were dissatisfied with the tactics illustrated by the excerpt. These critics were increasingly likely to argue that

choices.label: a constitutional amendment was needed to prevent the resegregation of public spaces
anticommunism should be a major component for gaining popular support of the movement
organizations needed to ally with other rights movements to gain more influence
nonviolent methods should be abandoned because they were ineffective

content.answer: nonviolent methods should be abandoned because they were ineffective

topic.text: 8.10: The African American Civil Rights Movement (1960s)

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
